title: WORKTERRA BenAdmin Selected By Groendyke Transport, Inc.
text:
WORKTERRA BenAdmin delivers Groendyke Transportation an automated, mobile accessible application for the benefit administration and enrollment of its widespread workforce
WORKTERRA, the easy-to-use, quickly implemented cloud-based benefits administration and talent management system for companies of any size, today announced the addition of Groendyke Transport, one of the largest tank-truck carriers in the nation, to its rapidly expanding client base. With a largely mobile workforce made up of more than 1,300 employees, Groendyke required a cloud-based, mobile accessible and user-friendly application that would promote user self-service. WORKTERRA BenAdmin delivers Groendyke a consolidated application that connects employees, administrators, carriers and payroll in a single place and provides anytime, anywhere access through proprietary mobile applications.
WORKTERRA BenAdmin enables Groendyke administrators to easily manage employee information, track enrollment progress, send personalized notifications and more from a single, automated application. Built to accommodate the needs of any organization, administrators are offered all the tools needed to easily set-up and manage an unlimited number of benefit plans required by their organization. Graphical analytics tools deliver easy to read charts and graphs allowing administrators to monitor and track employee enrollment activity direct from their personalized dashboard.
Employees are provided all of the tools needed to become engaged and proactive in the benefit election process. WORKTERRA BenAdmin is designed with the user in mind offering personalized dashboards, interactive decision support tools, enhanced communications and more encouraging employees to learn about and understand their comprehensive benefit plan. Side-by-side plan comparisons, benefit calculators and paycheck modeling tools guide employees step-by-step through the enrollment process ensuring they select the benefit plan that is best fit for them. Election updates are displayed in real-time, allowing employees to view their out-of-pocket costs, total deductions and dependent information the moment the change is made.
WORKTERRA proprietary mobile applications for iPhone, Android phones, iPad and Android tablets offers a convenient way for users to access personal information and update life events throughout the year, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
About Groendyke Transport, Inc. - Groendyke Transport is one of the largest tank-truck carriers in the nation with more than 80 years of expertise to liquid bulk shipping operations. Throughout North America, Groendyke operates with industry-recognized on-time performance and unparalleled dedication to safe and responsive service. The company is ISO 9001-registered carrier with the highest-quality commitment and processes in place to meet the most stringent qualifications with each and every load - more than 420,000 in 2014 alone. For more information visit http://www.groendyke.com
About WORKTERRA - WORKTERRA makes HCM easier, less confusing, and more efficient -- no matter the size of your company, today or tomorrow. It's a super-easy-to-use, quickly implemented, and extremely flexible benefits and talent management system that is smart, fast, and sharp. WORKTERRA is a cloud-based technology that's built from the inside out on a platform we designed, own, and continue to enrich through our innovation and passion. All of which ensures easy and fast configuration and enhancements. And because WORKTERRA is a unified system with every module on board, there's no outsourcing to worry about, no third-party apps to depend on. WORKTERRA won't leave you in the lurch after commitments are made or fall short under complex situations. Now, transform the way you manage benefits and people.
